description: Try our easy to follow Tuna Steaks With Green Salsa recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Tuna Steaks With Green Salsa Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Mix together the oil, lemon zest, parsley, and coriander seeds with plenty of pepper in a bowl, then rub over the tuna steaks.
Make the salsa by mixing together all the ingredients in a bowl. Season to taste and set aside.

Heat a ridged grill pan or skillet until smoking hot, add the tuna and cook for 1-2 minutes on each side, until well seared but still pink in the center. Remove from the pan and let rest for a couple of minutes.
Serve the tuna steaks with a spoonful of the salsa, a dressed salad, and plenty of fresh crusty bread.
